title: ANCIRS 2 Pack Smile Fridge Stickers, Cute Refrigerator Decal Smiling Face Stickers, Adhesive Vinyl Stickers on Freezer, Kitchen Wall Inside House
features: CUTE SMILING FACE STICKER: This fridge sticker is specially designed to decorate joyful environment with smile face and brings your family good mood and appetite in every day.
PREMIUM VINYL MATERIAL: This smiling face stickers are made of high quality vinyl material, environmental-friendly, non-toxic, odorless, strong adhesive, waterproof and durable for long time use.
EASY TO USE: Just remove the back side of the stickers and stress it in flat surface strongly. It's very easy for decor application.
WIDE APPLICATION: This smiling face stickers are widely applicable for decorating the fridge,kitchen,dining room,mirror,door, living room or anywhere you want to provide an interesting focal point.

NOTICE: This fridge stickers are mostly suitable for flat and dry surfaces, such as glass, acrylic paneling, flat painting wall, wood, ceramic, stainless steel, wallpaper and aluminum surface. NOT for brick wall, or any ash moldy unclean uneven oiled surfaces.
